title: People from riots plz help me. The 13 mins loading screen Really?
body:
So the game i just had gave me low priority queue for 5 games with wasting Total 100 mins for 5 games. I would admit this happened if i actuall i afked but i was on loading screen for 13 mins and on my screen Yasuo was 80% Master Yi was 13% and Annie was 0%. So i was waiting and keep thinking that they have slow internet or something because i was 100% then i went on face book. Then i quit the game and press reconnect it led me into game with 13 mins have passed. And of Course we lost game due to i was late. but my friend says i was on from 2 mins but didnt work on my screen. Well i dont care about loss but why the hell would i get the afk penalty with 20mins per game? Will You please FIx this or at least get rid of penalty on me. If YOu cant believe me please check the replay. out of 34:26 mins i wasted 13mins on loading screen.
PLEASE RIOT GET RID OF THE PENALTY I HAVE NOW!
And i WAS Jinx. Please help me..

replies.body:
So in other words, you DC'd in the loading screen, didn't realize and actually afk'd.

Regardless of the fact that it was partly not your fault, you still afk'd and that is what the low priority queue is for.

Also why would you think that a loading screen is 13 minutes?

so after me closing the client and turn it back on, i did get into game finally the game time by then was 13 mins so i assume that i have spent 13 mins for waiting alone (when everyone else was in game) also my friend told me i was in game but didnt move at all. also i did finish the game how is that an afk.
You were afk for the first 13 minutes, how is that not afk?
indeed, i dont care about loss but the low priority queue????? Twice in a week? REallY?
You got it *because* you've done it before. Leaving once doesn't give you low priority. It suck this happened to you one time, but you must have deliberately done it previously
um as long as that random dot next to your username changes number I assume I it is not frozen and not worth closing
well it was moving but others weren't 100% so i waited but over my limits so i closed and went back on and did finish the game how is that taken as DC or Afk.
